diseases.description: A fungal disease that appears as white powdery spots on leaves and stems.
diseases.treatment: Remove affected leaves, improve air circulation, and apply fungicides if necessary.

diseases.description: A condition caused by overwatering leading to fungal growth in the roots.
diseases.treatment: Reduce watering, improve soil drainage, and repot the plant in fresh soil if needed.
